## ğŸ› ï¸ Teknologiapino

- **AI/ML**: Mistral 7B, vLLM, Ollama, sentence-transformers

- **Blockchain**: Solidity, Hardhat, ERC-20
- **DevOps**: Docker, GitHub Actions
